DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this registry is to observe longterm performance and safety of the JenaValve TAVI system, in routine medical and everyday conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Longterm Safety and Performance of the JenaValve
DOC.criteria: Patients suitable for TAVI with the JenaValve according to instructions for use Patients unsuitable for TAVI with the JenaValve according to instructions for use
